biotools.summary: The SYSVAC resources aim to support National Immunization Technical Advisory Groups (NITAGs) and the World Health Organization Strategic Advisory Group of Experts on Immunization (WHO SAGE) in the development of evidence-based vaccination recommendations by simplifying the identification of relevant systematic reviews and access guidance on how to use existing reviews.

bioschemas.name: SYSVAC
bioschemas.summary: The SYSVAC resources aim to support National Immunization Technical Advisory Groups (NITAGs) and the World Health Organization Strategic Advisory Group of Experts on Immunization (WHO SAGE) in the development of evidence-based vaccination recommendations by simplifying the identification of relevant systematic reviews and access guidance on how to use existing reviews.
